plot: Music happens when a singing mute meets the girl of his dreams... But the path to true love isn't easy when you can only express yourself in song.
title: Damn the Past!
plot_es: Music happens when a singing mute meets the girl of his dreams... But the path to true love isn't easy when you can only express yourself in song.
plot_en: Music happens when a singing mute meets the girl of his dreams... But the path to true love isn't easy when you can only express yourself in song.
